text: this happened on Monday but it's only
yesterday that the family of the woman
finally built up the courage to go to
the police because especially in rural
areas of India people often believe the
police will not take such complaints
seriously and in the village itself we
understand many people are denying that
anything happened they're blaming the
woman herself for for raising this issue
so in some ways we're seeing the kind of
a familiar closing of ranks familiar
reaction to this to this kind of thing
the fact is though there are often
pretty shocking unofficial punishments
carried out on couples who are seen to
have transgressed codes by going off
with someone from a different caste in
this case in this case with with someone
are not from the tribe but this
certainly is a particularly shocking
case and I think given all the attention
has been on the issue of rape in India I
think we're seeing already the police
they're actually trying to take this
quite seriously what often happens in
other cases is that a woman and a man
when they are accused of breaking these
codes they are then both murdered often
by their own family by their own
relatives in this case we understand in
fact that the head man who ordered this
was in fact distantly related to the
woman the woman at the center of this a
these kinds of traditional punishments
although they are quite hard to
understand in the in the outside world
they still go on in many parts of India
but this is certainly as I say a
particularly shocking case
